summary: Frontend version markers were updated to 58 and a new Version 58 deployment guide was added. However, the diff also includes unrelated modifications (not explicitly requested) to backend code and project metadata, and it cannot demonstrate that an actual IC mainnet deployment and post-deploy smoke checks were performed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy Version 58 to the Internet Computer production network so the live canisters serve the Version 58 build (including executing `dfx deploy --network ic` and completing post-deploy smoke checks).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows code/documentation changes; it does not provide evidence of an executed production deployment or results of required smoke checks on the live site.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister code changes in `backend/main.mo` (new/expanded type definitions and imports shown) that are not requested by the BuildRequest, which focuses on version markers and deployment/docs.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asks for backend schema/type modifications as part of taking Version 58 live, and the BuildRequest explicitly discourages backend schema changes unless required by already-implemented Version 58 changes (not evidenced in the diff summary).

hallucinated_features.description: Updates/additions to repository metadata/state files not requested for the Version 58 publish (e.g., `project_state.json`).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requirements are limited to version markers, production deployment, and deployment documentation; project state tracking updates are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification of `frontend-file-summaries.txt` (large descriptive summary content) not requested for Version 58 deployment/version marker work.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request generating or updating a frontend file summary artifact.

hallucinated_features.description: Edits to the Version 57 deployment guide adding a superseded note while leaving Version 57 marker checks in place.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-45 allows either updating `deploy-v57.md` to Version 58 wording or adding a new `deploy-v58.md`. Since a new `deploy-v58.md` was added, changing `deploy-v57.md` is extra and not required by any acceptance criteria.
